title: Web & Social Media Leader
description:
**Job ID:** R0009308


**Date posted:** 28/10/2024


**Company description**  

With a unique Småland history, Älmhult is the heart of IKEA, where we have our roots. It’s the home of functional, well-designed, and affordable Swedish home furnishing and a center for innovation. We call it Democratic design.

**IKEA Älmhult AB**, including IKEA Museum, IKEA Hotell and IKEA Property, is on an exciting journey to make Älmhult an even better place for the next generation. We want Älmhult to grow, with both people and businesses and make this a unique and attractive place where the many people can experience IKEA yesterday, today, and tomorrow. We want to build the next generation of culture carriers and to strengthen the IKEA Brand. Are you ready to be part of this journey?


Please browse our websites IKEA Museum homepage and IKEA Hotell homepage and Aktivitetshuset Älmhult homepage to get to know us even better.

 **Job description**  

In the role as **Web & Social Media Leader** at IKEA Älmhult AB, your assignment is to lead and implement the web and social media strategy and plan, while securing business development and business objectives. You will also support The Story of IKEA (digital museum) and together with the marketing and creative teams, make sure the website and social media content follows IKEA tone-of-voice and visual identities. You collaborate, on a daily basis, with colleagues within IKEA, as well as with different external partners.


In this role, you are expected to:

* Support the business in web and social media related matters, including strategy, tactics and other according to business needs.
* Secure the digital channel strategy for maximum impact for owned media.
* Lead the total tech development and design plan including leading agencies and suppliers with the aim to position and grow our reach according to business objectives.
* Contribute to the overall web and digital development needs to secure competence and to balance business opportunities and risk.
* Lead close collaboration with creators and agencies to secure high level of creativity, optimization, and movement to grow our business.
* Lead topics across our businesses and functions with the aim to strengthen our positioning and business development.
* Secure consistency and alignment of plans in the team and other functions and businesses with the aim to maximize our impact and improve ways of working.
* Act as a role model leading by example and promoting the IKEA Culture & Values.

  

**Qualification**  

To succeed in this role, you are motivated by the IKEA vision and passionate about marketing, web, social media and communication. You possess good leadership and collaboration skills, including the ability to build strong relationships with people, teams, partners and stakeholders. You have an entrepreneurial mindset and driven by a constant urge to improve, develop and challenge and a strong will to influence and make a difference.


We see that you have:

* University degree in marketing & communication or similar
* Senior experience from web and social media, such as SEO, data and UX, web communication and content production, e.g. from senior role in agency or marketing department.
* Experience from leading web and social media strategy and plan, and creative processes.
* Updated knowledge on trends and development in the channel and media landscape.


You will work in an international and local context, therefore it is important you are fluent in both Swedish and English, spoken and written.


It will be a benefit if you have knowledge about IKEA concept and business model, are familiar with IKEA tone of voice and knowledge about IKEA communication processes.

 **More Information** **Does this sound like your next challenge?**


This is a temporary position for 1 year, full-time (40 hours per week) and located in Älmhult, Sweden. You will report to the Marketing & Communication Manager at IKEA Älmhult AB.

**We look forward to receiving your application** – CV and letter of motivation – in English, **no later than 11th of November**. Kindly note that due to GDPR and Data Privacy, we do not accept any applications via email.


If you have questions about the role, please contact Linda Fisti, linda.fisti@inter.ikea.com, Marketing & Communication Manager, IKEA Älmhult AB


If you have questions about the recruitment process, please contact Isabella Carlsson, isabella.carlsson4@inter.ikea.com, People & Culture Leader, IKEA Älmhult AB
company_description: At IKEA, we share an inspiring vision: “to create a better everyday life for the many people”.

title: Product Manager - var med och utveckla framtidens kollektivtrafik!
description:
*Visste du att 90 % av kollektivtrafiken i Sverige använder Hogias system? Detta innebär 4 miljoner resor dagligen. Vill du också vara med och bidra till att utveckla framtidens kollektivtrafik i Sverige och Norden genom våra IT-lösningar?*

### **Vad kan vi erbjuda dig?**


Nu ges möjlighet att i rollen som Product Manager få leda arbetet med utveckling av flera produkter som är avgörande för en fungerande kollektivtrafik i Norden. Du bidrar med din expertis till ett kompetent team med en djup teknisk kunskap och erfarenhet av produktutveckling inom kollektivtrafikbranschen.


Vill du vara en nyckelperson i arbetet med en framtida plattform för Trafik- och Resenärsledning inom kollektivtrafiken? Välkommen till Hogia Public Transport Products i Stenungsund!

### **Om tjänsten**


Du kommer arbeta i en central roll nära Product Owners, UX-designers, utvecklingschef och utvecklingsteam samt i tät dialog med andra Product Managers och Key Account Managers på vårt systerbolag Hogia Public Transport Systems. Du kommer också ha nära kontakt med våra stora kunder och samarbetspartners. Ditt dagliga arbete innebär både operativa och strategiska uppgifter i en utvecklande roll med goda möjligheter att bygga kompetens för att kunna vidareutvecklas inom bolaget.


Rollen innebär även att du:

* Har ett övergripande ansvar för domänens produktsortiment, ökad försäljning och kundbas.
* Samarbetar med marknadsförings- och försäljningsansvariga som en naturlig del i ditt dagliga arbete.
* Har personalansvar samt ett ekonomiskt ansvar för din resultatenhet, tar fram och förankrar en budget för din resultatenhet.
* Analyserar marknadstrender, kundbehov och konkurrenter i syfte att kunna agera för att nå målsättningar och främja försäljning.

### **Vem är du?**


Vi ser gärna att du som söker har en relevant akademisk utbildning och några års erfarenhet inom en produktorganisation önskvärt inom kollektivtrafikbranschen. Har du goda ledaregenskaper är detta ett stort plus. Då du kommer att ha många kontaktytor, både internt och externt, behöver du vara bekväm i att kommunicera på svenska och engelska i både i tal och skrift.


Vi söker dig med driv och en kommersiell förståelse; en engagerad och lösningsorienterad kollega som arbetar strukturerat och strategiskt för att nå uppsatta mål. Om du dessutom gillar utmaningar och har förmågan att motivera andra i din närhet - då är du en given kandidat.

### **Att jobba på Hogia**


IHogia Public Transport Products AB har vi samlat all utveckling som rör kollektivtrafik inom Hogias affärsområde Transport. Tillsammans med de andra bolagen inom området är vi en av Europas ledande leverantörer av IT-system för transportområdet, med kunder i hela världen. Vårt breda utbud av lösningar ger oss en unik position i vår förmåga att addera värde för våra kunder och för samhället.

*Ett axplock av vad du får hos oss på Hogia:*  

**Kompetensutveckling & utbildning:** Vi har gemensamma utbildningar, innovationsdagar och bjuder gärna in externa föreläsare.  

**Flexibelt:** Hos oss finns möjlighet att jobba hemifrån några dagar i veckan.  

**Välmående:** Hos oss finns goda utvecklingsmöjligheter och balans mellan jobb och fritid. Vi satsar på hälsa och erbjuder flertalet träningsaktiviteter varje vecka.  

  

*Urval och intervjuer sker löpande så välkommen in med din ansökan redan idag!*


Om Hogia-gruppen Hogia utvecklar, säljer och supportar programvaror och IT-system för företag som effektivt vill fokusera på sina verksamheter i stället för krånglig och tidsödande administration. Vi erbjuder allt från mindre löne- och bokföringsprogram för småföretagaren till kompletta, branschspecifika IT-lösningar och -system för exempelvis kollektivtrafik, åkerier, godsterminaler, revisionsbyråer och fastighetsbolag. I Hogiagruppen finns 30 operativa bolag, som vart och ett verkar inom ett väl definierat verksamhetsområde. Vår organisationsform bygger uttalat på småskalighet och entreprenörsanda. Företagskulturen skapar engagerade medarbetare. Tillsammans ger vi våra kunder de bästa tänkbara affärslösningarna. Hogia startade sin verksamhet 1980 i Stenungsund. I dag har den privatägda koncernen totalt 650 anställda på kontor i Sverige, Norge och Finland. Mer information om Hogia finns på www.hogia.se.


Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Stenungsund | Län: Västra Götalands län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2024/72 | Kontakt: Filippa Isaksson 0721-470800, | Publicerat: 2024-10-28 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-11-28

title: Software Engineer - User Experience (Full Stack)
description:
**The Opportunity**
-------------------


Join a high-caliber team working at the intersection of **AI, data, and user experience**. As a **Software Engineer**, you’ll build **interactive experiences** that enable users to effortlessly engage with AI-powered tools. You’ll be part of a mission that combines **technology and impact**, shaping the future of **generative user interfaces**.

**About the Role**
------------------


Are you excited about creating **intuitive, high-impact user experiences** powered by **AI**? We’re a well-funded, purpose-driven startup building **cutting-edge applications** with **large language models (LLMs)** and **generative design** to tackle complex global challenges. We’re seeking a **Software Engineer** who’s passionate about crafting seamless, dynamic interfaces using modern front-end and back-end technologies.

**Who You Are:**
----------------

You’re a problem solver with a passion for creating **delightful, intuitive user experiences**. You work confidently across the stack, leveraging **modern front-end frameworks** and back-end technologies to build responsive, scalable systems. You collaborate seamlessly with **Design Engineers** and **AI/machine learning experts** to bring innovative ideas to life.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Build and maintain **dynamic, scalable user interfaces** using **Typescript, React, and Next.js**.
* Work with **Design Engineers** to implement engaging, interactive experiences.
* Integrate **AI-driven functionality** using tools like **Vercel AI SDK**, **Langchain**, and **Embedchain**.
* Optimize data handling and performance with **Supabase**, **Postgres**, and **Timescale**.
* Apply **design frameworks** like **shadcn** and **Framer Motion** to create responsive, visually rich UIs.

**Skills & Experience:**

* Strong experience with **Typescript, React, and Next.js**.
* Familiarity with **Supabase**, **Postgres**, and **Timescale** databases.
* Knowledge of **AI integrations** (e.g., Vercel AI SDK, Langchain) is a plus.
* Collaborative mindset and experience working with **Design Engineers** and **AI experts**.
* Passion for creating **intuitive user experiences** with attention to detail.

**Benefits:**

* **Purpose-driven mission**: Work on projects with the potential for **global impact**.
* **Well-funded startup**: Competitive salary and **equity opportunities**.
* **Cutting-edge tech**: Build with the latest tools in **AI, UX,** and **data processing**.
* **Collaborative team**: Join a group of passionate innovators.

**About Bardo**
---------------


Bardo is on a mission to accelerate global decarbonization by offering enterprises a precise Carbon Intelligence platform. Our goal? To help businesses make fact-based decisions that reduce their environmental impact while improving profitability.


At Bardo, we’re reimagining how businesses gain control over their carbon emissions—bringing the same precision and clarity that financial systems offer. But we’re doing it in a way no one else has. By blending cutting-edge AI with deep data insights, we’re unlocking a new level of accuracy and understanding that will transform how companies track, manage, and reduce their carbon footprint.

title: Software Engineer - Data Platform
description:
**The Opportunity:**


Join a high-caliber team working at the intersection of **AI, data processing, and infrastructure**. As a **Software Engineer**, you’ll design and implement **scalable data pipelines** and infrastructure for AI-driven applications, with the potential to make a **global impact**.

**Who You Are:**


You’re an experienced software engineer with a deep understanding of **MLOps/DevOps** and scalable infrastructure. You’re skilled in building **data pipelines** and optimizing **data flow** at scale. You thrive in a collaborative environment, working with engineers and **AI/machine learning experts** to deliver robust solutions.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* **Design and build** scalable infrastructure for AI-driven applications and large-scale data processing.
* Implement and maintain **data pipelines** using modern tools like **Airbyte**, **Segment**, and **Meltano**.
* Use **Trigger.dev** to manage workflows and ensure seamless data movement.
* Collaborate with engineers and **AI experts** to integrate and optimize data processes.
* Automate infrastructure with a **DevOps/MLOps mindset** to enhance reliability and scalability.
* Monitor and optimize performance, addressing bottlenecks and ensuring security.
* Stay current on **MLOps**, **infrastructure as code**, and **cloud technologies**.

**Required Skills and Experience:**

* Proven experience in **MLOps/DevOps** and **data processing at scale**.
* Expertise in **data pipelines** with modern tools, e.g., **Airbyte**, **Segment**, **Meltano**, and **Singer.io**.
* Experience with **infrastructure automation**, **cloud platforms**, and orchestration tools like **Trigger.dev**, **Kubernetes**, and **Docker**.
* Strong knowledge of **CI/CD pipelines** and infrastructure as code.
* Ability to design efficient systems for **large-scale datasets**.

**Benefits:**

* **Purpose-driven mission**: Work on projects with the potential for **global impact**.
* **Well-funded startup**: Competitive salary and **equity opportunities**.
* **Cutting-edge tech**: Build with the latest tools in **AI, UX,** and **data processing**.
* **Collaborative team**: Join a group of passionate innovators.

**About Bardo**
---------------


Bardo is on a mission to accelerate global decarbonization by offering enterprises a precise Carbon Intelligence platform. Our goal? To help businesses make fact-based decisions that reduce their environmental impact while improving profitability.


At Bardo, we’re reimagining how businesses gain control over their carbon emissions—bringing the same precision and clarity that financial systems offer. But we’re doing it in a way no one else has. By blending cutting-edge AI with deep data insights, we’re unlocking a new level of accuracy and understanding that will transform how companies track, manage, and reduce their carbon footprint.

**Location:** Flexible/Hybrid (the team is based in Stockholm and Gothenburg)

title: Senior UX Writing Content
description:
Kommunikation 28 oktober 2024
**Senior UX Writing Content**
=============================


Period: 4 nov – 31 jan 2025  

Location: Stockholm full time on site hybrid  

Language: Fluent in english  

Hourly fee: 720 ex moms



At the Electrolux Group, a leading global appliance company, we strive every day to shape living for the better for our consumers, our people and our planet. We share ideas and collaborate so that together, we can develop solutions that deliver enjoyable and sustainable living.



Come join us as you are. We believe diverse perspectives make us stronger and more innovative. In our global community of people from 100+ countries, we listen to each other, actively contribute, and grow together.



As software is playing an increasingly significant role in enabling digital consumer experiences, we are gearing up to become more agile, faster in responding to market demands and quicker in identifying new market opportunities. This involves elevating our appliances to digital, software-defined products in a seamless integration of modular electronics, software, and connectivity platform.



We design for an array of household appliances including ovens, washing machines, humidifiers, robot vacuum cleaners, and more. We write for multiple brands within the Group portfolio and translate product copy into 45+ languages.



Now we’re looking for a senior UX writer to join our journey.



What you’ll do:



Use copy and language to help users around the world achieve their goals  

Shape content strategy for our future appliance UIs and connected ecosystem  

Collaborate with designers, researchers, creative technologists, product managers, and engineers to strengthen Electrolux Group’s digital product offering  

Help build an ambitious and supportive design culture



In detail, you will:


– Write clear, inclusive, accessible product copy for the end-to-end user experience, including onboarding, instructional flows, error messages, over-the-air updates, and more  

– Initiate, define, and design a data-informed content approach for new products and features  

– Partner with our global translation and localization team to ensure copy scales globally  

– Work with product and marketing teams to name new features and instil a unified voice across product platforms  

– Contribute to our design system, regularly adding to and editing our global glossary and creating UX writing guidelines as needed  

– Be a part of growing UX writing at Electrolux. You’ll share ideas and take initiative to shape ways of working and best practices in our discipline and content community



Who you are:


You have 5+ years relevant experience in UX writing and/or content strategy for digital products or services  

You’re familiar with translation and localization best practices and tools, such as Phrase and Figma  

You’re self-driven and organized with a proactive, collaborative approach to problem-solving  

You’re an excellent communicator who articulates the rationale for your work and illustrates how it aligns with customer needs and business goals  

You’re a champion for UX writing, skilled at explaining what it is and why it matters to cross-functional stakeholders  

You’re fluent in English with an attention to detail with spelling and grammar, proficiency in other languages is a bonus  

You have a portfolio in English that showcases a range of UX writing work and tells a story about how you think and collaborate



You demonstrate:



Collaboration- contributes to a highly collaborative environment that enables a cross functional team to flourish  

Communication – effectively exchanges information and ideas with confidence and respect, able to demonstrate progress, raise issues and articulate changes on a frequent basis  

Empathy – can understand and acknowledge the emotions and perspectives of others during conversations  

Problem-Solving – able to connect the dots between insights, strategy, and conceptual direction; is outcome – as opposed to task – orientated.  

Adaptability & Resilience – can effectively navigate change, challenges, and setbacks while maintaining a positive and flexible approach  

Proactivity – eager to learn and grow, sees challenges as opportunities, seeks and – is responsive to – feedback  

Responsibility – accountable, reliable, and proactive in building systems and handling dependencies, contributing to a trustworthy and effective team dynamic


**Your application:**



CV + portfolio in english that showcase a range of UX writing work and tells a story about how you think and collaborate.

title: Senior Produkt designer
description:
Sweetspot växer och söker fler passionerade medarbetare för att hjälpa våra kunder förbättra sin affär. Vi erbjuder mjukvaru- och hårdvarulösningar för golfklubbar, simulatorer och träningsanläggningar med över 100 kunder globalt och 15 000 dagliga aktiva golfspelare i vår app. Nu söker vi en erfaren Senior Product Designer för att leda ett team och aktivt arbeta med vårt designsystem. Vi söker en unik designer som är bekväm med att navigera mellan affärsstrategi, designhantverk och som har djup förståelse för webteknik.
  
  

Detta är en heltidsroll baserad på vårt huvudkontor i Stockholm, med en hybrid arbetsmodell. Vi förväntar oss att vara fysiskt närvarande på kontoret 2-3 dagar i veckan.
  
  

**Vad du kommer att göra på Sweetspot:**  

* Bidra till övergripande strategi och beslutsfattande kring produktens riktning.
* Hjälpa till att leverera tydlig storytelling om kundbehov och affärsmöjligheter.
* Samarbeta tvärfunktionellt med produktledning, ingenjörs- och designkollegor.
* Skapa, samarbeta och iterera flöden, prototyper och högupplösta visuella lösningar.
* Designa och implementera högkvalitativa funktioner och produktförbättringar.
* Bidra till den fortsatta tillväxten av “ScrambleDS” (vårt designsystem).
* Vara åt mindre erfarna kollegor


**Några projekt du kan arbeta med:**  

* Förbättra arbetsflöden, processer och kommunikation mellan PMs, designers och utvecklare.
* Designa vår nya Driving Range lösning.
* Designa vår kommande POS 2.0 och dess integration med det befintliga Sweetspot-ekosystemet.
* Designa den nya versionen av vår Golf Academy-lösning, som riktar sig till golftränare och deras kunder.
* Introducera innovativa samarbetsmetoder för att förbättra teamarbetet.
* Utforska nya AI-teknologier och verktyg för att påskynda processen från design till produktion.
* Arbeta med att identifiera nya möjligheter för vår bransch och bidra till att forma den framtida visionen för 2025 och framåt.


**Vi vill gärna höra från dig om du har:**  

* 7+ års erfarenhet av att arbeta som produktdesigner.
* Stark förståelse för användarcentrerade designprinciper och a11y.
* Stort öga för detaljer och känsla för visuellt hantverk, inklusive komposition, typografi och layout.
* Avancerad kunskap i Figma, särskilt i att använda funktioner som Auto Layout, Variabler och Komponenter.
* Utmärkta organisatoriska färdigheter i ditt hantverk.
* Utmärkt kommunikations- och presentationsförmåga; du kan tydligt förklara och motivera dina designbeslut och strategier.
* Kännedom om webteknologier som HTML/CSS. Även om kodning inte krävs, bör du ha en fungerande förståelse och kunna använda Chrome-inspektionsläge.
* Mycket god engelska för effektiv kommunikation med vårt team, våra kunder och användare.
* En positiv attityd.


**Det är ett plus om du dessutom har:**  

* Stark förståelse för användarcentrerade designprinciper och produktstrategi.
* En bakgrund som kombinerar design och utveckling, eller erfarenhet av att bygga webbplatser eller appar.
* UX-forskningsfärdigheter, både kvalitativa och kvantitativa.
* Intresse för golfbranschen som affärsområde.


På Sweetspot tror vi på att anställa smarta, nyfikna människor som är ivriga att lära sig och utveckla sina färdigheter. Om du är entusiastisk över denna roll men din tidigare erfarenhet inte stämmer helt med punkterna i jobbannonsen, uppmuntrar vi dig att ansöka ändå. Du kan vara precis rätt kandidat för denna eller andra roller.
  
  

På Sweetspot firar och stöttar vi våra olikheter. Vi vet att en mångfald av tankar, erfarenheter och åsikter gör att våra anställda, vår produkt och vårt företag kan blomstra.

title: Senior UI Programmer
description:
Remedy Entertainment, the creator of Control®, Max Payne®, Alan Wake®, and one of the leading independent game studios in the world, is looking for a Senior UI Programmer to create high-quality gaming experiences for the next generation of games.
  
  

Do you want to bring game User Interfaces to life through code? Are you passionate about programming high-quality UI components while maintaining frame and memory budgets in mind? In this role you would work alongside fellow UI programmers, UI/UX designers, Gameplay programmers and other relevant stakeholders, to build HUD widgets, Menus, and assorted UI components to serve the game vision.
  
  

You would have an impactful role in the game UI, as well as a chance to impact the overall UI craft by contributing to custom tools and technology, both with feedback and direct contributions.
  
  

About the Craft & Remedy The UI Craft is a small team distributed among all ongoing Remedy projects, developing each project’s UI and sharing knowledge, frameworks and tooling in the Northlight engine. We enthusiastically welcome diverse viewpoints and backgrounds. We at Remedy value and are committed to ensuring an inclusive and safe work environment for all our team members.
  
  

WHAT YOU GET TO DO
  
  

* As a Senior UI Programmer, you will be responsible for creating UI components and utilities to manage low-level DOM manipulation, by means of web technologies on top of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Additionally, you will delve into the heart of the game and write high-level C++ code to bring your UI alive.
* You will participate in code reviews, share technical solutions with the UI craft and contribute to advancing our workflows and pipelines in Northlight with our UI Toolkit.
* You have good communication skills, can effectively collaborate with designers, programmers, scripters and artists, and are willing to document your solutions for relevant parties to deliver the scope of the project


WHAT YOU BRING TO THE ROLE
  
  

You are an expert in the modern web stack (Typescript, JSX, CSS Preprocessing, bundlers, etc.) You have deep knowledge of the DOM API, browser Event Loop, Layout and Draw performance effects of the different HTML/CSS operations You are proficient in modern, high-level C++ programming You know how to build and optimize experiences with performance constraints: videogames, embedded web, mobile, etc. You are capable of working independently and at ease within a large, distributed project team. Experience with Coherent Labs frameworks and Lua scripting are considered a plus.
  
  

WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU?
  
  

At Remedy, you get to work on awesome, memorable gaming experiences for our players in a studio where your input is valued, and your creative freedom is encouraged. We offer a collaborative environment that values both individual and teamwork, ensuring that everyone’s voice is heard and workloads stay manageable. We believe in and support work-life balance—happy people work better!
  
  

* We work in an environment that values both individual and teamwork, ensuring that everyone’s voice is heard & workload stays sensible. We believe in and support work-life balance. Happy people work better!
* We offer an extensive set of employee benefits and an annual bonus system as well as opportunities for you to develop your skills further. On top of this, in Finland and Sweden you get up to 5 weeks of paid vacation, in addition to public holidays and other special occasions.
* We have two offices, one in Finland, in the Helsinki metropolitan area, and one in Stockholm, Sweden. Both locations are well known for their exceptional quality of life, free education and pristine nature at your doorstep.
* If you are not already in Finland or Sweden, our relocation service is there every step of the way to take care of you. You can concentrate on work, while we take care of everything else.
* Our studio is embracing a hybrid work model that gives you the flexibility to work from home and have valuable face-to-face time with your colleagues.


To apply, please fill in the application form with your CV (in English), work references/portfolio and other information relevant to the position. This position will be filled as soon as suitable applicants are found.
  
  

Join us and you’ll discover a vibrant, connected universe filled with stories and characters that stay with you long after you switch off.​​
  
  

Over the past 25 years we’ve built a unique, people-first environment where​ courageous creativity thrives. You might be surprised by the next thing we release,​ but you’ll have no doubt it’s Remedy.
  
  

The Remedy culture consists of three core values. They describe who we are and how we work and interact together. We base our decisions and actions on camaraderie, pioneering spirit, and smart creativity. Our three core values together make us One Remedy.

title: Technical UX/UI Designer
description:
IO Interactive is currently looking for a Technical UX/UI Designer to join our Backbone team. We are currently working on two exciting game projects: Project 007 and Project Fantasy. Project 007 is a brand-new James Bond video game featuring an entirely original Bond story, and Project Fantasy is an ambitious new IP for console and PC that will revolutionize the online fantasy RPG genre.
  
As we work on these exciting projects, we need a skilled professional to assist us in the development of our state-of-the-art propriety game development engine, Glacier.
  
This is a unique opportunity to shape the UX/UI of Glacier, a proprietary game engine with a growing user base of developers, artists, and designers. As a Technical UX/UI Designer, you’ll play a crucial role in making the engine more accessible and functional for internal users, paving the way for future advancements. If you’re passionate about technical UX and excited to bring your expertise to a transformative role, we’d love to meet you!
  
This is a permanent position based in our Malmö, Brighton, or Barcelona studios, with the option to work from home up to two days per week.
  
  

**What you will do:**  

Identify and resolve inconsistencies within our Glacier engine, ensuring tools are easily accessible for internal users.
  
Deepen your understanding of the Glacier engine’s complexities to effectively prioritize usability improvements.
  
Develop a comprehensive UX strategy focused on core needs, with UI enhancements as a secondary objective.
  
Work closely, primarily with tools programmers and stakeholders such as level designers and technical artists, to understand user requirements and deliver designs that enhance their workflow.
  
Conduct user experience research within the team to understand pain points and satisfaction levels, using feedback to drive continuous improvements.
  
  

**Who you are:**  

You have 5+ years of UX/UI design experience, ideally within the gaming industry or in application/software development.
  
You’re familiar with major game engines (e.g., Unity, Unreal Engine) or have experience working on internal tools for large teams.
  
You bring a strong portfolio showcasing successful UX/UI projects, especially in complex or technical software environments.
  
You’re passionate about understanding user needs and skilled at translating feedback into actionable design solutions.
  
You’re a proactive self-starter, comfortable taking initiative in a pivotal role.
  
  

**Who we are:**  

IO Interactive is an independent videogame development and publishing company with studios in Copenhagen, Malmö, Barcelona, Istanbul and Brighton. As the creative force behind some of the most talked-about multiplatform video games in the last decade, we are committed to creating unforgettable characters and experiences – all powered by our award-winning, proprietary Glacier technology.
  
We know that to achieve those goals, we need courage, talented people and a great working environment – and we do our utmost to have all of that. Across our multiple studios, we’re working on several projects. Crucially though, we’re all one team. We value the work and impact that each person brings to the table and we actively encourage new ideas, whilst listening to your insights along the way.
  
We have a dedicated team of People Managers, who look after you as an individual and as an employee. With more than 40 nationalities, we know that everyone is different and we are proud to have a reputation for being a friendly workplace with highly-talent people.

title: Elevate Your Career as a Software Architect for Control Edge
description:
Locations: Malmö, Göteborg, Stockholm (Hybrid Work Model)


Are you passionate about leading the charge in cloud technology transformation? We're on the lookout for a visionary Software Architect to join our dynamic team at Control Edge, a premier financial solution for large enterprises under the Visma umbrella. If you're ready to merge strategic architectural leadership with hands-on development, this is your call to action!

  

Your Mission:

* Architectural Leadership: Leverage your expertise to craft cutting-edge design solutions, lead technical reviews, and mentor your peers, leaving a remarkable mark on our technological landscape.
* Standard Development: Be the vanguard of innovation by establishing and promoting high-quality coding standards that drive excellence.
* Documentation & Presentation: Illuminate complex systems through meticulous documentation and insightful presentations, captivating diverse audiences.
* Hands-On Development: Channel your coding prowess, focusing on C#.NET, ASP.NET Core, SQL Server, and JavaScript, to guide and implement best practices.
* Technical Debt Management: Investigate, track, and eliminate technical debt, ensuring our platforms are robust and agile.
* Innovation Liaison: Stand at the forefront of tech trends, with a sharp focus on AI, to innovate and future-proof our solutions and internal development efficiency.
* Agile Advocate: Operate within our ISO9001-certified agile process, ensuring the seamless delivery of quality software.
  


Your Unique Talents:

* Architectural Visionary: Your core passion and experience lies in building software that adheres to industry-leading best practices and latest technology trends (like AI) while uniting teams under a common vision.
* Tech Stack Proficiency: With expertise in C#.NET, ASP.NET Core, SQL Server, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, you set the bar for exceptional technical standards, particularly on our Azure cloud platform.
* Microservices Maestro: Deploy and manage applications with architectural excellence and finesse.
* DevOps Dynamo: Revolutionize deployment processes through your mastery of CI/CD tools, enhancing development efficiency.
* Security Savvy: Fortify our systems with your knowledge of implementing security best practices.
* Experienced Architect: Your proven track record as a Software Architect marries leadership with technical prowess, steering projects towards excellence. Ability to present architectural plans and concept in an understandable way both to developers as well to non “techies”.
  


Bonus Expertise:

* Hands-on experience with Blazor & Angular.
* Familiarity with gRPC for advanced communication protocols.
* Good understanding of implementing unit and automated tests to ensure code quality and reliability.
  


Exciting Challenges Await:

* Harmonize hands-on development with strategic advisory roles.
* Foster a thriving work environment through collaboration and teamwork, bridging the gap across geographies using tools like Slack, Jira, Google Meet, and Confluence.
* Shape the future of agile transformation and make an impact that transcends code.
* Engage in enriching team gatherings multiple times a year to build camaraderie and align our innovative strategies.
  


Why You'll Thrive Here:

* Be a trailblazer in Europe’s cloud transformation journey.
* Collaborate with passionate colleagues from Romania and Sweden.
* Enjoy the dynamism of a tech-savvy yet agile mid-sized enterprise but still being able to take full advantage of being part of the large tech group Visma, with a strong community around architecture, UI/UX, security, and more
  


Meet Your Future Colleagues:

* Ole Johan: A project-leading guru with a passion for development and gardening.
* Fredrik: Merges business analysis skills with a knack for storytelling from his travel adventures.
* Reine: Balances technical skills with a love for fitness and culinary creativity.
* Anastasia: Excels in C# by day and conquers ski slopes with a zestful spirit.
* And several others who prefer to present themself in person. In total we are 26 coworkers within development, in different roles and divided on four teams with different focus


Are you ready to embark on this transformative journey with us? Join us and make your mark on the future of software architecture!


  
Department
Software Development
Role
Software Architect
Locations
Göteborg, Malmö, Stockholm
Remote status
Hybrid Remote
Application deadline
10 November, 2024
Competencies
C#

title: UX/UI-designer
description:
Vi söker just nu en UX-designer med inriktning mot UI till Bonnier News! Vill du arbeta nära våra redaktioner och bidra till att förbättra våra redaktionella verktyg samt utveckla vår digitala journalistik?
 



  





 I denna roll får du möjlighet att samarbeta med välkända varumärken som Expressen, Dagens Nyheter och Dagens Industri, samt våra lokala tidningar runt om i landet men även vissa internationella titlar. Vi når miljontals människor varje dag genom webb, appar, och tidningar i olika format som text, ljud och video. Kom och bli en del av vårt team och gör skillnad i hur vi levererar nyheter till våra läsare!
 



  





**Om oss** 




 Med cirka 2 500 journalister och 8 000 anställda över hela landet är Bonnier News Sveriges ledande nyhetsaktör och Nordens största mediekoncern. Vår journalistik når ut till sex miljoner läsare, lyssnare och tittare varje dag. Vi erbjuder en bred och djup bevakning av nyheter, från snabba uppdateringar till långläsning, och täcker internationella, nationella och lokala perspektiv. Att försvara det fria ordet är centralt för oss.
 



  





**Om rollen** 




 Du kommer bli en del av ett kärnteam bestående av tre UX-designers och en redaktionell utvecklingsredaktör. Teamet är en del av Innehållsdomänen som bland annat arbetar med vårt egenutvecklade CMS-verktyg för redigering och publicering. Fokus är alltså på interna verktyg för journalister och redaktörer. Du får direkt tillgång till användarna och kommer nära vårt journalistiska arbete i en kreativ och experimentell miljö. Inom våra produkt- och tech-organisationer arbetar cirka 300 personer, inklusive 180 utvecklare och 25 UX-designers och Designers.
 



  





 Vi har en flexibel approach men utgår oftast från en klassisk UX-process, från behovsanalys och research till skisser, iterationer och tester fram till färdig produkt. Vi använder feedbackloopar och retrospektiv för att förbättra samarbeten och arbetsflöden.
 



  





**Dina främsta arbetsuppgifter är** 
 :
 


* Utveckla och förbättra användarupplevelsen och gränssnitt för våra interna verktyg som redaktionerna arbetar med.
* Du utgår ibland från ett framtaget behovsunderlag och ibland är du själv med och specar behoven tillsammans med redaktionell utveckling och användarna.
* Samarbeta med redaktion, produktägare och utvecklare i nära feedback-loop.
* Självständigt bygga och skapa nya designlösningar och komponenter i
 **Figma** 
 .
* Hålla workshops, presentera inför andra och iterera designskisser baserat på feedback från användare och stakeholders.
* Optimera och utveckla arbetsflöden i ett snabbt tempo, med fokus på både kortsiktiga och mer omfattande mål.



  





**Vem är du?** 




 Du är nyfiken och vill utvecklas samtidigt som du tar eget ansvar och initiativ i designprocessen. Du är trygg i att presentera för större grupper och trygg i att självständigt strukturera ditt arbete. Vi söker dig som har god samarbetsförmåga och kommunikationsförmåga. Du trivs i en miljö som präglas av förändring och högt tempo som växlar mellan snabba och mindre uppgifter till mer omfattande lösningar.
 



  





**Kvalifikationer** 
 :
 


* Universitets- eller högskoleutbildning inom UX/UI eller motsvarande.
* 3-5 års arbetslivserfarenhet inom UX med fokus på UI-design.
* Erfarenhet av att skapa kompletta designkomponenter i Figma.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Figma är ett krav för att komplettera teamet och kunna leverera från start.
* Du leder tryggt designprocessen från behovsanalys till användartester och lansering.
* Erfarenhet av att jobba nära och ta fram/iterera på lösningar tillsammans med utvecklare.
* Flytande svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.
* Förståelse för hur man bygger upp och förvaltar ett designsystem är
 **meriterande** 
 .
* Erfarenhet av andra verktyg som Favro är
 **meriterade** 
 .



  





**Övrig information** 




 Tjänsten är ett vikariat på 11 månader med goda möjligheter att efter vikariatet fortsätta inom Bonnier News 25 personer stora UX-skrå som arbetar tvärgående i hela organisationen.
 



  





 Du kommer att tillhöra kompetensgruppen CX, UX och Design och rapporterar till kompetensgruppschef Frida Nyvinger och tillsammans sitter vi i ”Tidningshuset” på Gjörwellsgatan 30, Kungsholmen i
 **Stockholm** 
 . Alternativ arbetsplats är Sundsvalls Tidnings kontor tillika Bonnier News hub på Badhusgatan 1 i
 **Sundsvall.** 




  





 Hos Bonnier News får du tillgång till förmåner som ett generöst friskvårdsbidrag på 5000 kr, rabatter, fri prenumeration på våra nyheter och extra ersättning vid föräldraledighet. Vi erbjuder även en bra pensionslösning inom ITP enligt vårt kollektivavtal.

title: UX Designer/Strategist
description:
Future colleague!
 



  





 In your search for the perfect company, fate has led you to Remotion, a trailblazing Swedish consulting powerhouse. We're not your ordinary 9-to-5 establishment. Oh no, we're so much more. 
 



  





 At Remotion, we're a diverse blend of dancers, surfers, hunters, actors, football players, and baristas. But don't let our unconventional hobbies fool you. We're also a team of passionate management consultants, performance marketers, growth managers, data scientists, and creatives. Together, we possess an unwavering belief that we've unraveled the secret to driving unparalleled corporate success for companies that need to adapt to the age of digital. 
 



  





 So, if you're ready to embark on an exhilarating journey where innovation knows no bounds, join us at Remotion and become a driving force behind data-driven growth, personalized omnichannel experiences, and performance marketing excellence.
 



  





**We seek** 




 You are a dedicated UX Designer and Strategist with a passion for creating user-centric experiences. Highly organized and detail-oriented, you approach your work with creativity and an openness to new solutions and tools. Colleagues recognize your ability to translate user needs into effective design strategies and value your curiosity and problem-solving mindset.
 



  





 You have an strategic mindset and are deeply curious about human behavior and approach design with empathy and inclusivity, always seeking to understand diverse user needs. You focus on details while maintaining a holistic view of the user experience, connecting the dots to identify key challenges. You enjoy exploring user behaviour patterns, forming hypotheses, and developing creative solutions that address real problems.
 



  





 Collaboration is essential to your design process, and you excel at guiding projects from concept to execution while working closely with cross-functional teams. With proficiency in relevant design and analytic tools, you develop user-focused solutions that align seamlessly with both business goals and user needs.
 



 Your understanding of the relationship between UX and content ensures that your designs are not only functional but also engaging. Committed to quality, you consistently deliver best-in-class work that enhances user experiences and meets client objectives.
 



  





**About the position** 




 As a UX Designer and Strategist at Remotion, you will enhance our clients' user experience across web and mobile products. Your responsibilities include conducting UX audits, performing user research, and creating intuitive visual solutions. You'll collaborate closely with project managers, content strategists, designers, and developers.
 



  





 Your primary focus will be identifying user challenges and pain points to improve user satisfaction. You’ll map customer journeys, create empathy maps and personas, and analyze user behavior through tools like Hotjar and Google Analytics. Based on these insights, you’ll provide actionable recommendations for optimizing site structure and user flows, while designing wireframes and mockups in Figma or similar tools. You’ll ensure tha the design meets both user needs and business objectives an also aligned with development capabilities.
 



  





**Examples of work assignments** 



* Conduct audits of websites and apps to identify and create strategic recommendations
* Conduct user research through interviews, questionnaires, and usability tests.
* Analyze user data to make informed strategic decisions
* Define user personas and map customer journeys.
* Evaluate navigation and user flows for clarity and effectiveness.
* Create wireframes and mockups for design concepts.



  





**Your experience** 



* A degree in UX design, human-computer interaction, or a related field.
* 3 – 5 years of professional experience in UX strategy & design
* Ability to analyze user behavior and provide actionable recommendations to improve user journey.
* Proficiency in design tools such as Figma, Adobe XD or similar to create visually compelling designs for web, mobile, and other platforms
* Experience with design systems, UI principles and best practices.
* Proficiency in Hotjar, and Google Analytics
* Experience with CMS platforms like WordPress, Optimizely, or similar systems.
* Understanding of accessibility and WCAG
* Strong problem solving skills, accuracy & strategic mindset.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
* Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
* Familiarity with agile working methods & project management tools such as Trello, Miro, ConceptBoard, etc.
* Integrating AI tools seamlessly into your daily workflow.
* General understanding of SEO fundamentals & tools
* Fluent in spoken and written Swedish and English



  





**Extra plus if you...** 



* Knowledge on CSS and HTML
* General knowledge/experience in content creation
* Experience in other design tools: Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, AfterEffects
* Experience on SEO Tools such as Semrush, Ahrefs, etc



  





**We offer** 



* A dynamic organization guided by agile principles, cross-functional teams, and dual leadership.
* A culture that values collective intelligence, self-leadership, and embraces diversity.
* Exciting opportunities for annual international trips, team-building conferences, and dedicated competence development days.



  





 This is a project-based position/subcontract. The role is temporary, linked to specific projects with duration and terms tailored to project needs. Ideal for those seeking flexibility and the opportunity to work on diverse and challenging projects in our industry.
 



  





 This is a hybrid position based in Stockholm requiring regular office attendance; fully remote work is not an option. Additionally, we are looking to fill this position promptly and unfortunately, we cannot provide sponsorship for a working visa. Applicants must have or quickly secure the legal right to work in Sweden. Understanding of the Swedish language and experience in Swedish business contexts are expected, though fluency is not required.
 



  





 In this process, we will require a strong portfolio that highlights your previous work and design solutions, showcasing your expertise. For qualified candidates moving forward, we will assign a small UX assignment/case as a part of our decision making process.
 



  





 Please note that we have a streamlined application process and kindly request that you refrain from sending applications via email. However, if you have any questions or need further information, feel free to reach out to our dedicated contact person for this recruitment process. We eagerly await your application and the chance to connect with you!
 



  





 Curious to learn more about the Remotion experience? Explore our company in more detail by visiting our website.

title: iOS Developer  (Intern)
description:
**XR Solutions** 
 is a technology based company that utilizes machine learning and powerful research-based optimizations to provide practical, reliable and optimizing augmented reality solutions to industrial companies.
 



 We believe that our AR technology can change working methods, the way of thinking and enable new innovative solutions that previously was not achievable in industry and machine operation.
 



  





**Role Overview:** 




 We are seeking a passionate and dedicated IOS Developer Intern to join our team for an Internship. This is an exciting opportunity for someone looking to gain hands-on experience in frontend development and XR within a fast-paced and supportive environment.
 



 As an IOS Developer Intern at XR Solutions, you will work closely with our developers.
 



  





**Required Skills:** 



* Proficient in using Xcode - mainly oriented on SwiftUI.
* Perfect understanding of async/await, actors and multithreading.
* Experience utilizing APIs in Swift code.
* Ability to implement clean and structured SwiftUI Views according to Figma designs.
* Basic understanding of UX/UI designs methods.
* Proficiency using Git tools (GitHub, Bitbucket) in team environment.
* An ability to easily communicate and work with others in teams, both with colleagues and customers.
* A self-propelled working method.
* A user-focused mindset – a passionate drive for understanding and meeting user needs.
* Open mindset to try new working methods and software tools that just launched on the market.
* Experience with ARKit/RealityKit
 *(Meritorious).*
* Aware of latest features that Swift language adds like SwiftData, Observation, SwiftTest
 *(Meritorious).*



  





**Tools & Technologies:** 



* Development Tools: Xcode, ARkit, Hoppscotch, Unity.
* Cloud & DevOps: AWS (Amazon Web Services), CI/CD pipelines.
* Project Management: Jira for task management and collaboration.
* Communication: Slack for team communication and coordination.



  





**What You’ll Gain and work with:** 



* Hands-on experience in frontend development.
* Exposure to industry best practices in software development and XR Space.
* Opportunity to work on real-world projects and contribute to innovative solutions.
* Valuable insights into working in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
* Conduct research on technology solutions.
* Designing, developing, and testing UI for mobile and XR applications
* Solving market challenges together with the team with our groundbreaking product.



  





 If you’re excited about this opportunity and eager to learn, please send your resume outlining your interest in the position. We look forward to helping you grow your skills and advance your career in IOS development.
 



  





 This is a unpaid internship initially

title: Devops, HR, financial, marketing, Art director, UX, developers
description:
**Company Description** 




 noQ is a
 *tech-for-good non-profit* 
 organisation dedicated to building IT systems for exposed people on earth. Our vision is
 **zero exposed people** 
 and or current mission -
 **zero homeless in Stockholm christmas 2024** 
 .
 



**We don't have any sympathy - but lots of compassion. Do you?** 





 ﻿
 

 See www.noq.nu for more information.
 




  





**Role description** 





 We are seeking (wannabe) professionals in many areas, not only software development, who can contribute to our mission with compassion and engagement. At noQ you will work together with other experts/rookies and get a work experience of its own. And of course new friends and one step forward to your next job. If you are looking for doing real good - welcome!
 




  





 We are looking for engaged volunteers who will work minimum 5 h/week at least for 6 months. The work is remote from your home and you provide the tools for this. Here are some roles we recruit for: system developer, legal advisor, project manager, art director, doer, finance support, data scientist, copywriter, People and culture specialist, mood manager, data engineer, designer, UX, scrum master, board member, requirement specialist, ML engineer, event manager, product owner, devops, system architect, marketeer, administrator, visionary etc.
 



 We are always looking for these roles but for now, the ones in the title are more important.
 



 We bring on everybody, whether you are a professional or just curious. It is the skills that matters...
 



  





**Mandatory skills** 



* Fluid skills in Swedish or English.
* Wannabe communicative skills in Swedish or English.
* Engagement
* Compassion
* Helpful
* Proactive
* Teamplayer



  





**Apply** 




 You apply via our homepage to one of our infomeetings: https://noq.nu/bli-volontar/
 



 After this meeting it is up to you to proceed. If you go all in, we decide on a start date together. Welcome to noQ - we have sympathy - do you?

title: Grafisk Formgivare (vikariat)
description:
**Sveriges mest inspirerande destination för en aktivare livsstil söker en vikarie till webbteamet i form av en grafisk formgivare för en tjänst med 100% i sysselsättningsgrad.** 




  





**Om Länna Sport** 




 Länna Sport är ett familjeägt företag som grundades 1973. Sedan starten har vi velat inspirera till en aktivare livsstil genom en kunnig och engagerad personal som hjälper kunderna med rätt utrustning från vårt handplockade sortiment. Destinationen består idag av fyra kanaler, en fysisk butik, e-handel och klubb & företagsförsäljning.
 



  





 För att vara Sveriges mest inspirerande destination för en aktiv livsstil behöver vi engagerad och kunnig personal. Vi erbjuder ett ansvarsfullt arbete i ett växande företag med stark sammanhållning och möjligheter till personlig utveckling.
 



  





**Arbetsuppgifter** 




 Vi söker dig med gedigna kunskaper i att kreativt skapa, designa och utforma annonser och visuella koncept. Du kommer att leda projekt från idé till färdig produkt, vilket kräver en stark förståelse för varumärkesidentitet och visuell kommunikation. Du förväntas vara innovativ och villig att utveckla Länna Sports marknadsföring, oavsett kanal.
 



  





**Några av dina uppgifter inkluderar:** 



* Design och utveckling av visuella koncept för kampanjer, nyhetsbrev och sociala medier.
* Ansvar för den visuella utvecklingen och användarupplevelsen på hemsidan och i våra sociala kanaler.
* Skapa grafiskt material för både digitala och tryckta medier, såsom nyhetsbrev, META-annonser, tidningsannonser, butiksskyltar och eventmaterial.
* Arbeta med varumärkesbyggande och säkerställa en konsekvent visuell profil över alla kanaler.
* Skapa rörligt material och animationer för sociala medier, videokampanjer och annonser med hjälp av After Effects eller liknande program.
* Hantera och optimera bilder och grafiska element för webb och mobil.
* Samarbete med vår e-handelsplattform för att säkerställa att den grafiska designen är tekniskt genomförbar, med viss kunskap inom UX/UI-design.
* Utvärdera och analysera kampanjers resultat och utfall samt rapportera dessa.
* Bidra med kreativa lösningar för att stärka varumärkesnärvaro och engagera målgruppen, oavsett plattform.
* Hålla dig uppdaterad med de senaste trenderna och teknikerna inom grafisk design och digital marknadsföring.



  





**Erfarenhet och kunskaper** 



* Kunskaper inom HTML, CSS och UX/UI-design är meriterande.
* Ett starkt intresse och engagemang för e-handel, marknadsföring och designtrender.
* Erfarenhet av Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign och After Effects).
* Erfarenhet av att skapa både stilla och rörliga annonser för olika digitala plattformar.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med analysverktyg såsom Google Analytics och A/B-testning för att optimera design och användarupplevelse.
* Erfarenhet av nyhetsbrevsdesign och uppbyggnad, inklusive arbete i verktyg som Apsis eller liknande.
* Förmåga att driva flera projekt parallellt och slutföra dem inom deadline.
* Kreativ och självgående med god initiativförmåga.
* Mycket god samarbetsförmåga och förmåga att arbeta i team.
* Kunskaper inom originalframställning för tryck och färghantering.



  
 



**Anställningen** 



* Anställningsform: Tidsbegränsad anställning. Vikariat ca 12 månader med eventuell möjlighet till förlängning.
* Omfattning: Heltid
* Tillträde: Enligt överenskommelse
* Arbetstider: mån-fre 8:00-17:00
* Arbete utförs på plats i företagets lokaler i nära anslutning till butiken.



  
 



**Ansökan** 




 Bli en del av Länna-teamet och skicka din ansökan till jobb@lannasport.se. Bifoga CV och portfolio – märk mailet "Vikariat grafisk formgivare" och ditt namn.

title: Senior UI Designer, Solna
company_industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
**Be a part of creating the digital customer experiences of the future with us at PostNord. Join the UX/UI designer team in Stockholm!**
 Join UX/UI designer team for Postnord and be part of creating great customer experience for our customers. You will be part of an UX/UI team where you will as UX designer have an ownership for the business portal. You will also be part of a team UX/UI designers that continuously improving how we work with design.
   

  

**Join us**
 We, the UX/UI are working in an agile environment where the team independently owns the product from start to finish. Within the team, it is important that everybody has their say, and we always strive to improve our way of working.
   

  

 Our head office is in Solna, Stockholm. Three days in the week we make sure to meet each other in our office in Solna.
   

  

 Find out more and follow us on LinkedIn!
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
 Design visually stunning user interfaces for our digital services, both web and app that adhere to PostNords brand guidelines. Contribute and maintain to the evolution of our design system and maintain design documentation with other UX designers. Working closely with product managers, UX designers, and developers to understand user needs and business requirements to ensure the design implementation meets quality standards. Create wireframes, mockups, and prototypes to effectively communicate design ideas. Conduct user research and usability testing to validate design decisions. Iterate on designs based on feedback and user testing results. Stay up-to-date with the latest design trends, techniques, and technologies.
   

  

**Must haves**
* Relevant education within Interaction Design or equivalent field.
* Minimum 4-5 years of work as a UI designer.
* Strong portfolio showcasing previous UI design projects/tasks.
* Have worked with, or even developed, UI libraries in Figma.
* Great understanding of user-centered design principles and best practices.
* Prior experience in designing user interfaces for both web and mobile applications.
* Understanding the fundamentals of graphic design and typography and being able to apply that in their daily work.
* Understanding the fundamentals of designing for accessibility and WCAG 2.1 requirements.
* Fluency in the Swedish and English language, both spoken and written.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience with HTML, CSS and JS.
* Understanding of IT processes such as Scrum, Kanban, and Agile.


**We offer you**
* A great team, you are both part of the market web team but also a bigger team with a focus on customer-facing solutions at Postnord.
* Agile is our way of working, we have daily's, refinement meetings and sprint retros.
* Flexible hybrid workplace with an open working climate.
* To be part of a large organization with endless development opportunities for you as a developer and individual.
* Good insurance and occupational pension conditions.
* Wellness allowance and access to office gym and swimming pool.
* Employee benefits through PostNord's own employee foundation PostNord Plus.
* Employment according to a collective agreement.


**We make everyday life easier**
 PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region. We are accountable, brave and committed, effectively leading change regardless of if we lead ourselves or others. We emphasize teamwork, sincerity and positive relationships in the workplace. We build on our success and learn from both colleagues and mistakes. People with different backgrounds work with us. You will therefore be part of a workplace with great diversity, which contributes to better results for the business. Visit us at www.postnord.com.
   

  

**Apply**
 What are you waiting for? Welcome with your application. Selection is ongoing, so apply as soon as possible. If you have any questions about the position, email Sonja.prest@postnord.com.
   

  

 For union representatives, visit: www.postnord.com/fackliga
   

  

 We are looking forward to hear from you!
   

  

 #UXdesigner #joinusatdigital
